author: Benedict Brook
title: Coronavirus Australia: Australians isolated in hotels hit back at critics, say they’ve been “abandoned”
description: Coronavirus Australia: Australians isolated in hotels hit back at critics, say they’ve been “abandoned” news.com.au
content: An Australian returning from overseas who is now being forced to isolate in an international hotel has hit back at claims they are grumbling at five-star accommodation, branding their critics as cruel. Hotel guests that news.com.au has spoken to have said the… [+6367 chars]
